member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetConstantBufferByIndex
member.summary: Gets a constant buffer by index for a function.
member.returns: A pointer to a interface that represents the constant buffer.

member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetConstantBufferByName
member.summary: Gets a constant buffer by name for a function.
member.returns: A pointer to a interface that represents the constant buffer.

member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetDesc
member.summary: Fills the function descriptor structure for the function.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the function.
member.returns: Returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetFunctionParameter
member.param: The zero-based index of the function parameter reflector to retrieve.
member.returns: A pointer to a interface that represents the function parameter reflector.

member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetResourceBindingDesc
member.summary: Gets a description of how a resource is bound to a function.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that describes input binding of the resource.
member.returns: Returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetResourceBindingDescByName
member.summary: Gets a description of how a resource is bound to a function.
member.param: The constant-buffer name of the resource.
A pointer to a structure that describes input binding of the resource.
member.returns: Returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12FunctionReflection.GetVariableByName
member.param: A pointer to a string containing the variable name.

summary.para:
A function-reflection interface accesses function info.
Note This interface is part of the HLSL shader linking technology that you can use on all Direct3D 12 platforms to create precompiled HLSL functions, package them into libraries, and link them into full shaders at run time.
